name: Task
definition: An object like a to-do item

name: Log
definition: Like a to-do item but completed. These are not a type from Salesforce.

name: Account
definition: A person, a customer, a contact

name: CUDL
definition: The sync process for fast-changing items that are relevant because they are will happen soon or did happen recently

name: TrickleSync
definition: The sync process for slower-changing items, including Contacts and Opportunities.
